description: This Dart source file defines providers for managing application state with the Provider package. It includes a function to construct a list of provider widgets and a class providing a static method for the same purpose, specifically managing authentication state.

classes.name: AppProviders
classes.description: A utility class providing a static method to build a list of app providers using the AuthState.

methods.name: buildAppProviders
methods.description: Builds a list of provider widgets with the given AuthState.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Static method that constructs the provider list utilizing buildAppProviders.
